text: Gerald Alden "Jerry" Wiegert (July 12, 1944 â€“ January 15, 2021) was an American automotive engineer and businessman. He was the founder of two companies, Vector Motors and Aquajet. Wiegert was born in Dearborn, Michigan. Wiegert died on January 15, 2021 at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Vector Motors * Aquajet official site Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Engineers from Michigan Category:Businesspeople from Michigan Category:People from Dearborn, Michigan
title: Gerald Wiegert
